```{r}
a7=data.frame("year"= 2017,"id"= archetype7$id,"archetype"= archetype7$archetype)
a6=data.frame("year"= 2016,"id"= archetype6$id,"archetype"= archetype6$archetype)

t=rbind(a3,a4,a5,a6,a7)
head(t)
(total=table(t$archetype))
sum(total)

```
```{r, fig.height=7,fig.width= 14}

ggplot(data=archetype7,aes(archetype7$archetype)) + geom_bar()

ggplot(data=t) + geom_bar(aes(x=year,fill=factor(archetype)))


ggplot(data=t) + geom_bar(aes(x=year,fill=factor(archetype)), position = position_dodge(preserve = 'single'))

```
